titleStmt.title: The royal charter of confirmation granted by His Most Excellent Majesty King James II, to the Trinity-House of Deptford-Strond for the government and encrease of the navigation of England, and the relief of poor mariners, their widdows and orphans, &c.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)

notesStmt.note: "A list of the first thirty one elder brethren, appointed by this charter": p. 106; Samuel Papys is listed as Master.
Added t.p. on p. [197]: Orders, constitutions, and by-laws ...
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
